import pandas as pd

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
sns.set(rc={'figure.figsize':(8,6)})

from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelBinarizer, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier, AdaBoostClassifier
from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier

from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, confusion_matrix

from sklearn.model_selection import GridSearchCV

source.8e9ccce3: x_treino, x_teste, y_treino, y_teste = train_test_split(x, y, test_size=0.2)
source.b22e0298:
GBC = GradientBoostingClassifier()
GBC.fit(x_treino, y_treino)
pre_GBC = GBC.predict(x_teste)
acc = accuracy_score(y_teste, pre_GBC)
print('Acurácia:', acc*100)
cv = confusion_matrix(y_teste, pre_GBC)
print(cv)
